test.name: Verify Text on DUT using Appium

kw.name: Verify Text Appium Full
kw.msg:
Visible texts on screen:
In-app purchases
Ends on 1/21/26
Watch Feludar Goyendagiri: Royal Bengal Rawhoshyo from 24th December
Install
In-app purchases
Sponsored
Suggested for you
Dating apps
For you
Top charts
Kids
Categories
Games
Apps
Search
Books
You
kw.doc: Verifies FULL visible text using Appium (exact match). Fails if only partial text is found.
